alert.note: Alert for Logan; Noble; Payne (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 11:37AM CDT until August 29 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Noble County in northern Oklahoma... Northeastern Logan County in central Oklahoma... Western Payne County in central Oklahoma... * Until noon CDT. * At 1137 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles northwest of Lake Carl Blackwell to near Mulhall, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Stillwater, Morrison, Mulhall, Orlando, Lake Carl Blackwell and Lake Mcmurtry. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
